definition: to express sympathy, greetings, consolation etc

sentences.english: Telegrams expressing sympathy poured in from all parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全國各地紛紛打來了慰問電。

sentences.english: Please convey my sympathy to your wife.
sentences.chinese: 請向你夫人轉達我的慰問。

sentences.english: Yesterday, the City Federation of Trade Unions held in sympathy with the Urban Management Committee of the sanitation workers activities.
sentences.chinese: 昨日，市總工會與市城管委舉行慰問環衛工人活動。

sentences.english: Doris Leuthard, president of the Confederation of the Federal Council of Switzerland, sent sincere condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士聯邦主席洛伊特哈德向中國人民表示誠摯慰問。

sentences.english: Part - Star team will be composed of condolences to the grass-roots level performance.
sentences.chinese: 部分明星還將組成小分隊到基層進行慰問演出。

sentences.english: Fellow entertainers including Chow Yun-Fat, the couple's long-time friend, have sent condolences.
sentences.chinese: 娛樂圈內演藝人員包括摯友周潤發前至哀悼慰問。

sentences.english: The Brazilian government also offered condolences and sympathies to the Chinese government and people.
sentences.chinese: 巴西政府向中國政府和人民表示同情和慰問。

sentences.english: Mongolian Prime Minister Sukhbaataryn Batbold expressed deep condolences to the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古總理巴特包勒德向中國人民表示深切慰問。

sentences.english: The Democratic Presidential hopeful plans to visit the fallen officier's family.
sentences.chinese: 這位民主黨候選人希望能夠慰問死者的家屬。

sentences.english: I commiserate with you on the loss of your mother.
sentences.chinese: 你母親逝世，我特向你慰問。

sentences.english: Has China sent condolences to the Indonesian side?
sentences.chinese: 是否已向印尼方表示慰問？

sentences.english: They sent me a letter of sympathy.
sentences.chinese: 他們寄給我一封慰問信。

sentences.english: At this time of sorrow, deep sympathy goes to you and yours.
sentences.chinese: 在這悲慼的時刻，謹向和的親致以深切的慰問。

sentences.english: Your sympathy and kindness will always be remembered.
sentences.chinese: 你的慰問和關心，我將永銘在心。

sentences.english: On behalf of the Special Administrative Region government and Hong Kong people, he offered condolences to her family.
sentences.chinese: 曾蔭權還代表特區政府和人民向肥肥的家人表示慰問。
你寫一封弔唁信表示慰問。

definition: care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to show concern and care for
to give one's respects/to send a greeting/(fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)
